name: New Exporter Help
detail: Provides guidance and support for individuals or businesses venturing into international trade and export for the first time.

name: Sell Your Products Online
detail: Digital platform that empowers businesses and individuals to effortlessly showcase and sell their products on the internet

name: Featured Products
detail: Explore these featured products to support your agricultural export endeavors and enhance your farming operations.

name: Market Insight
detail: Market insight is an ongoing process that requires continuous monitoring and adaptation to stay competitive and capitalize on opportunities.

name: News and Updates
detail: Stay ahead in the export game with the latest updates on international trade agreements, tariffs, and market trends.
